/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise traditional setting. Cars are parked along the side of the road, indicating a bustling city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
